moments.description: 'The Matrix' came out in theatres, and the first 30 minutes of it went down in history as the some of the greatest in action sci-fi film history. Downhill from there.
The film 'Rat Race' was a lighthearted romp that included commentary on consumer culture and how there is no such thing as altruism.
'Shrek' also came out I am pretty sure.'
'The Matrix: Reloaded' came out, letting down tons of fans by devolving into a formulaic blockbuster with a pretty lame religious allegory.
'The Matrix: Revolutions' came out a few months later, which is very odd. It was the worst of the trilogy.
